title: (x) Topshop â€” ES Magazine / geometric display sans w/ varying character widths - Organda {Mike Y}
content:
Anyone know which font this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209075227im_/http:/typophile.com/files/styleadvisor_home_6056.jpg)
author: 1UP

comments.content:
It's Organda Bold, an old Image Club font.

- Mike Yanega

There is a Mecanorma version of [Organda](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209075227/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/organda-mn/bold/characters.html), but it only has half the glyphs that are in the Image Club font.

- Mike Yanega

I do have the old Image Club font, but I have not located it elsewhere on the web yet. Fonts.com also seems to have the Mecanorma version which seems to be only the upper case glyphs.

- Mike Yanega
